revised_title: Investigating the Crystallization Mechanisms and Structures in Polymers
tldr: This article explores the crystallization phenomena in polymers, focusing on the fine structure and the course of crystallization. The authors analyze the mechanisms of crystallization, including nucleation and growth processes, and propose a helical ribbon structure for radiating fibrils in spherulites. The study provides insights into the relationship between molecular arrangement and physical properties of crystallized polymers.
